body:
i'm thankful for the music of [khruangbin](https://open.spotify.com/album/42j41uUwuHZT3bnedq2XtM), which is full of sexy grooves and is perfect summer cool down vibes. 

i'm thankful that at the grocery store i bought three bananas, because i know i won't eat more than that before they ripen more than i like.

i'm thankful for [this discussion of whether the best food is sauce (and, related, whether sauce is food)](https://youtu.be/SYNA0rHVWcI?t=19m56s).
